content.prompt: Which of the following best summarizes the author’s thesis in the passage?

choices.label: Stories are fundamental to one’s sense of self.
Stories are more important than science to many cultures.
Stories are the result of an individual’s lived experience.
Stories are undervalued in many modern societies.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify and describe the overarching thesis of an argument, and any indication it provides of the argument's structure.
